title: 服务器刷怪效率低
txt_content: 1.7.10KC端，难度所有世界都是HARD，没有设置不刷怪，求助，晚上跑一整天都没有怪

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content:
/mvm set monsters true
/mvm set animals true
/mvm set difficulty 3
/difficulty 3
/gamerule doMobSpawning true
/mvrule doMobSpawning true
 /resadmin set monsters true
 /resadmin set animals true

再不刷怪算你赢了
